channel.title: nex on Barefoot Rob
channel.description: Recent content in nex on Barefoot Rob

item.title: Narita Express
item.description: 16:26 Wednesday 03 February 2016 JST We’re on Narita Express now, headed to Shinagawa. Yay! I wish Fred were with us. Dang there seems to be no electrical outlet near these seats. I thought we had outlets when we to NEX to the airport. 16:37 Bah. My computer battery is dying like a boss while the image import from my phone has been chillin’ at 2 minutes remain for 5 minutes.

item.title: on Narita Express
item.description: 13:35 Friday 22 January 2016 JST Lin and I are chillin on Narita Express #27, 1700 yen each from 品川 to Narita Airport (成田 ah crap I forgot this word) I’ve just confirmed my packing and buying list was completed on time! 17:07 JST Late start leaving, but we’ve just started boarding, 2 minutes after departure time. During the delay, I got an extra ticket done for CB. yay!
